dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the MMDVFS OPP3 and CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issues as root causes.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not mention SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics were correctly identified, but some specific VCORE percentages were missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The diagnostic reasoning was logical and correctly identified MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were practical and relevant, though not exhaustive.
